original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)🔽18.3. Hetuduka, Hetusahetukadukādi🔽Hetuṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Nahetuṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya  hetu duka hetu sa hetuka duka ādi  hetum hetuñca iva sa hetukañca dhammam paṭicca na hetu na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  na hetum sa hetukam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na hetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Hetuṁ hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.

original: Nahetuṁ hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum hetu sampayuttam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na hetu vippayuttaḥ ca iva na na hetu ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: Dependent on a state that is not a root cause and is associated with root causes, there arises a state that is not a root cause and is dissociated from root causes. (In brief:) … with respect to root causes, one … with respect to the unwholesome, one … with respect to the indeterminate, one.🔽Dependent on a state that is not a root cause and is not a root cause but is associated with root causes, there arises a state that is not a root cause and is not a root cause but is associated with root causes. (In brief:) … with respect to root causes, one … with respect to the unwholesome, one … with respect to the indeterminate, one.🔽Dependent on a state that is not a root cause and is not a root cause but is associated with root causes, there arises a state that is not a root cause and is not a root cause but is not associated with root causes. (In brief:) … with respect to root causes, one … with respect to the unwholesome, one … with respect to the indeterminate, one.

original: Nahetuṁ nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Nahetuṁ nahetuṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum na hetum sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na hetu na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka 🔽na hetum na hetum ahetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na hetu na ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: Dependent on a state that is not a root cause and is not a root cause but is associated with root causes, there arises a state that is not a root cause and is not a root cause but is associated with root causes. (In brief:) … with respect to root causes, one … with respect to the unwholesome, one … with respect to the indeterminate, one.
